paper_abstract: We describe an explicit algorithm to factorize an even antisymmetric N(2) matrix into triangular and trivial factors. The construction resembles the Crout algorithm for LU factorization. It allows for a straight forward computation of Pfaffians (including their signs) at the cost of N(3)/3 flops. paper_title: A factorization algorithm to compute Pfaffians
